Key:
All right. Homeroom's done, so I should go
on a date with someone today.
Translation:
De acuerdo. La clase ha terminado, así que
debería tener una cita con alguien hoy.

Key: ...Shido-san.

I could've sworn I heard someone call my name.
Did it come from the hallway?
Translation:
Juraría que oí a alguien decir mi nombre.
¿Venía del pasillo?

Key: Oh, how nice of you to notice me.
Translation: Qué amable de tu parte fijarte en mí.

Key: K-Kurumi?!
Hey, come over here!
Huh? Sure...
*pant, pant*...
What's the matter?

Y-You know, you shouldn't appear out of
nowhere.
Translation: Sabes, no deberías aparecer de la nada.

Key:
What would you do if you bumped into Tohka
or Origami...?
Translation:
¿Qué harías si te encontraras
con Tohka u Origami...?

Key: Were you worried about me?
No, that's not it. Huh?

(She's right. Why was I so focused on whether
or not she was seen? Am I worried about Kurumi?
Or did I just want to avoid another battle?)
Translation:
(Tiene razón. ¿Por qué estaba tan concentrado en si
la veían o no? ¿Estoy preocupado por Kurumi?
¿O sólo quería evitar otra batalla?)

Key:
(Argh, no good! I'm getting stuck in my head.
I did so because I wanted to.)
Translation:
(¡Argh, no vale! Me estoy atascando
en la cabeza. Lo hice porque quise).

Key: Shido-san, is something the matter?
Oh, um. Nothing.

Anyways Kurumi, why'd you come by my
classroom?
Translation:
De todas formas Kurumi,
¿por qué has venido a mi clase?

Key: Oh, well...
I wanted to be the one to invite you.
Translation: Quería ser yo quien te invitara.

Key: ...Invite?
Yes... Shido-san, will you go on a date with me?

(Okay. Gotta go with the flow. Seems like
Kurumi's changed, and is ready.)
Translation:
(Vale. Tengo que seguir la corriente.
Parece que Kurumi ha cambiado y está preparada).

Key: Got anywhere in mind?

Anything is fine with me. I will let you escort
me, Shido-san.
Translation:
Cualquier cosa me parece bien.
Dejaré que me acompañes, Shido-san.

Key:
(My heart jumped. She grabbed her skirt and
curtsied, almost like a princess—)
Translation:
(Mi corazón dio un salto. Se agarró la falda e
hizo una reverencia, casi como una princesa-)

Key: (No, no. Wait! Calm down! It's not like that!)

(I can't let my guard down too much. Kurumi
said she had a meal" in the alley.)"
Translation:
(No puedo bajar la guardia demasiado. Kurumi
dijo que tenía una comida" en el callejón)".

Key: (Wait, calm down!)
What's on your mind?
I-I just can't think of a good place to go.
Translation: No se me ocurre un buen sitio al que ir.

Key:
Goodness. What am I to do with you?
That place will do, won't it?
Translation:
Dios mío. ¿Qué voy a hacer contigo?
Ese lugar servirá, ¿no?

Key: O-Okay.
Now, after you, escort.
Okay. Here I go.

(Why does it feel like I'm letting her take
control?)
Translation:
(¿Por qué siento que estoy dejando
que ella tome el control?)

Key: My! Shido-san, look! So many dogs and cats!

R-Right. It's a pet store. Have you never been
in one before?
Translation:
C-Claro. Es una tienda de mascotas.
¿Nunca has estado en una antes?

Key:
I have. Not often. This one looks friendly.
Here, come hither.
Translation:
Lo he hecho. No muy a menudo.
Este parece amistoso. Aquí, ven aquí.

Key: Look how friendly it is.

Yeah, it's adorable. Oh, so you don't like
zoos, but you're okay with pet stores?
Translation:
Sí, es adorable. ¿Así que no te gustan los zoológicos,
pero te parecen bien las tiendas de mascotas?

Key:
Yeah, it's adorable. Oh, when you think about
it, it's kind of sad, isn't it? They're stuck in
a small cage until someone buys them.
Translation:
Sí, es adorable. Cuando lo piensas, es un poco
triste, ¿no? Están atrapados en una pequeña
jaula hasta que alguien los compre.

Key:
Shido-san, don't ruin a fun date with your
pessimistic musings.
Translation:
Shido-san, no arruines una cita divertida
con tus cavilaciones pesimistas.

Key: S-Sorry...

(But I wonder what she's really thinking.
Outwardly, Kurumi's having fun, but...)
Translation:
(Pero me pregunto qué estará pensando realmente.
Por fuera, Kurumi se está divirtiendo, pero...)

Key:
(Maybe the alligator was just being mistreated.
Thinking about it, I couldn't help but smile.)
Translation:
(Tal vez el caimán estaba siendo maltratado.
Pensando en ello, no pude evitar sonreír).

Key:
(*sigh*. Sure seems like Kurumi loves animals.
She's having a blast just... petting them.)
Translation:
(*suspiro*. Parece que a Kurumi le encantan los
animales. Se lo pasa en grande... acariciándolos).

Key:
(She's usually so... mature, but looking at her
now, she's acting so free-spirited. How
precious.)
Translation:
(Suele ser tan... madura, pero viéndola
ahora, actúa con tanto espíritu libre.
Es preciosa.)

Key:
What do you think, Shido-san? Do you think
this outfit is cute?
Translation:
¿Qué piensas, Shido-san?
¿Crees que este conjunto es bonito?

Key: Totally. I think it suits you well, Kurumi.
Translation: Totalmente. Creo que te queda bien, Kurumi.

Key: Then, how about this?
Another good choice.
If I had to pick one, which would you prefer?
Translation: Si tuviera que elegir uno, ¿cuál preferiría?

Key: What? They both look nice. I can't decide.
Translation: ¿Cómo? Ambos se ven bien. No me decido.

Key:
Unacceptable answer. In times like these,
women want your opinion. Otherwise, she'll
think you simply don't care.
Translation:
Respuesta inaceptable. En tiempos como estos,
las mujeres quieren tu opinión. De lo contrario,
pensará que simplemente no te importa.

Key: Oh, point taken. I'll be careful.
I like that you don't make excuses, Shido-san.
Translation: Me gusta que no pongas excusas, Shido-san.

Key: ...! D-Don't make fun of me.
I'm not making fun of you. I meant it.
Translation: No me estoy burlando de ti. Lo decía en serio.

Key:
(I felt my heart skip a beat. I could tell that I
was beginning to blush. Kurumi's smile had
that effect on me.)
Translation:
(Sentí que el corazón me daba un vuelco.
Me di cuenta de que empezaba a sonrojarme.
La sonrisa de Kurumi tenía ese efecto en mí).

Key: We've sure stopped by a lot of places.
Translation: Seguro que hemos pasado por muchos sitios.

Key:
Yes. I had so much fun that I've lost all sense
of time.
Translation:
Sí. Me he divertido tanto que
he perdido la noción del tiempo.

Key: I'm kinda hungry. Wanna grab a bite?
Translation: Tengo un poco de hambre. ¿Quieres comer algo?

Key: Sure.

How about crepes from the shop? What do
you want, Kurumi?
Translation:
¿Qué tal unos crepes de la tienda?
¿Qué quieres, Kurumi?

Key: I will leave it up to you, Shido-san.
Translation: Te lo dejo a ti, Shido-san.

Key: Got it. Hang on a minute.

It's been a while since I had crepes.
It was so yummy!
Translation:
Hacía tiempo que no comía crepes.
¡Estaban tan ricas!

Key: That it was. I'm glad that I left it to you.
Translation: Así fue. Me alegro de habértelo dejado a ti.

Key: Right? ...*nom*.
Oh, Shido-san...
Hm?
There's some cream on your finger.
Oh...? You're right.
Let me see.
K...Kurumi?!
You can't move... Haaa.
K-Kurumi, that's enough.
No. There's still a spot...

(Kurumi's cheeks were getting rosier. Maybe
she's excited, or shy. Well, I couldn't really
see Kurumi getting shy.)
Translation:
(Las mejillas de Kurumi se estaban sonrosando.
Tal vez está emocionada, o tímida. Bueno,
realmente no podía ver a Kurumi volviéndose tímida).

Key: Ah. Okay, fine. Do as you please.
Translation: Ah. Ok, bien. Haz lo que quieras.

Key:
(Kurumi nodded with an alluring expression.
My heart was racing.)
Translation:
(Kurumi asintió con una expresión seductora.
Mi corazón se aceleró).

Key: A-Are you done?
...Yes. Thank you.
Perhaps, I enjoyed it a bit too much.
...Your face is red.
Oh, is that so? Hehe. I was excited.

Or, would you rather that I was shy?
Would you prefer that?
What the...

(Man, she can read me like a book. It's kinda
creepy. Either that, or it's written all over my
face.)
Translation:
(Dios, puede leerme como a un libro.
Es un poco espeluznante. O eso,
o está escrito en mi cara).

Key:
Well, I need to go soon. Hehe. Today was fun.
I even satisfied my sweet tooth.
Translation:
Bueno, tengo que irme pronto. Jeje. Hoy ha sido
divertido. Incluso satisfice mi diente dulce.

Key: Y-Yeah. Hey, Kurumi...
What is it?
That "meal" you mentioned...
Y-Yeah...
...Shido-san.
What is it?
I must go. Something has come up.
Something came up?
Yes. I have to hurry, so farewell for now.
Translation: Sí. Tengo que darme prisa, así que adiós por ahora.

Key: Hey. Kurumi?!

The crepe was delicious. As were you,
Shido-san.
Translation:
El crepe estaba delicioso.
Como tú, Shido-san.

Key: What?!

Kurumi... I forgot to ask her about this
afternoon.
Translation: Kurumi... Olvidé preguntarle por lo de esta tarde.

Key: HEY! WAIT! Kurumi...
